      width: 33%;     }      .step-text div {       width: 120px !important;     }      /* END: Progress Tracker Desktop CSS */     /* Start ADA Styles */     *:focus {       outline-offset: 4px;       outline: #006FCF solid 2px;       border-radius: 1px;     }      /* End ADA Styles */We have an update on your fraud inquiry.SAKSHAM NAYYARAmex Reference Number: C-54224887Membership Number: 72003We have an update on your fraud inquiry         Inquiry InitiatedInquiry SubmittedInquiry in ProgressInquiry ResolvedDear SAKSHAM NAYYAR, Thank you for making us aware of the charge(s) on your American Express® account that you believe is unauthorized or is otherwise in dispute. We are temporarily crediting your account for $400.00 while we investigate this charge(s). The credit adjustment(s) above will appear on an upcoming statement and reflect all charges billed to your account that you reported as unauthorized or in dispute, along with any interest charges and/or miscellaneous fees that may have been billed to your account as a result of the charge(s). Please note, any merchant credits you receive towards the charge(s) will be debited to avoid duplicate credits which will also be reflected on an upcoming statement. If we need additional information from you to assist with our investigation, we'll be sure to contact you. Otherwise, if you don't hear from us before September 28, 2025, you may consider this case resolved. We regret any inconvenience you may have experienced and thank you for the opportunity to assist in this matter. Sincerely, American Express Privacy StatementContact usThis is a customer service e-mail from American Express. Using the spam/junk mail function may not block servicing messages from being sent to your email account. To learn more about e-mail security or report a suspicious e-mail, please visit us at www.americanexpress.com/phishing. We kindly ask you not to reply to this e-mail but instead contact us securely via americanexpress.com/helpThe issuer of this Card is American Express National Bank.Copyright 2025 American Express. All rights reserved. FRD00135 SSF0CTA124
